sentences.en: a smooth pebble
sentences.cn: 光滑的卵石

sentences.en: Blend the cornflour to a smooth paste with a little cold water.
sentences.cn: 加入少量的凉水，将玉米粉搅拌成均匀的糊状。

sentences.en: Continue whisking until the mixture looks smooth and creamy.
sentences.cn: 一直搅拌，直至混合物变得均匀细腻。

sentences.en: He has one of those silky smooth (= very smooth ) voices.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音柔和圆润。

sentences.en: Her skin felt smooth and cool.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤摸上去又滑又凉。

sentences.en: His bare feet were smooth on top and rough-skinned underneath.
sentences.cn: 他赤裸的双脚脚面很光滑，脚底却很粗糙。

sentences.en: Puree the apricots in a liquidiser until completely smooth.
sentences.cn: 用榨汁机将杏打成糊状，直至完全搅匀。

sentences.en: She stood up and smoothed down her frock.
sentences.cn: 她站了起来，抚平了自己的连衣裙。

sentences.en: She was smooth-skinned and pretty.
sentences.cn: 她皮肤光滑，非常漂亮。

sentences.en: Smooth down all the surfaces before you start painting.
sentences.cn: 上油漆前把全部表面都磨平整。

sentences.en: Smooth the mixture with the back of a soup spoon.
sentences.cn: 用汤勺的背面把混合料抹平。

sentences.en: The active suspension system gives the car a very smooth ride.
sentences.cn: 这个主动悬架系统使汽车行驶起来非常平稳。

sentences.en: The car neatly blends classic styling into a smooth modern package.
sentences.cn: 这款汽车巧妙地将经典式样融入到流线型的现代设计中。

sentences.en: The flagstones beneath their feet were worn smooth by centuries of use.
sentences.cn: 他们脚下的石板路经过数百年的踩踏，磨得光溜溜的。

sentences.en: The mud is smooth, gray, soft, and plastic as butter.
sentences.cn: 这种泥浆呈灰色，它光滑、柔软，像黄油一样易塑。

sentences.en: The new government has promised a smooth transition of power.
sentences.cn: 新政府承诺保证政权的顺利交接。

sentences.en: The ride was smooth until they got into the merchant ship's wake.
sentences.cn: 航行一直很顺利，直到他们碰上了商船的尾流。

sentences.en: The stone steps had been worn smooth .
sentences.cn: 石阶被磨得光溜溜的了。

sentences.en: The wood was smoothed and trimmed to size.
sentences.cn: 木头被刨平并切割成需要的尺寸。

sentences.en: Twelve extremely good-looking, smooth young men have been picked as finalists.
sentences.cn: 12名特别漂亮精明的青年男子被选为参加决赛的选手。

sentences.en: Using a whisk, mix the yolks and sugar to a smooth paste.
sentences.cn: 用打蛋器将蛋黄和糖打成均匀的糊状。

sentences.en: When dry, feel the surface and it will no longer be smooth.
sentences.cn: 晾干之后，表面摸上去就不再光滑了。

sentences.en: Whisk the mixture until it is smooth and creamy.
sentences.cn: 把混合物搅拌至均匀细腻。

words.tran_cn: 平稳地，平滑地；流畅地，流利地
[公路] 路面平整机；弄平的人；[机] 修光工具；滤波器
举止优雅的人；善于讨好女人的男子；一种果汁与牛奶的混合饮料
举止优雅的人；善于讨好女人的男子
使光滑；消除（障碍等）；使优雅；缓和

phrases.tran_cn: 光洁度；光面精整；光泽装饰
平滑流；连续流；平滑怜；平稳流动
平滑线；均匀分布参数线路
正常运转；平稳运转，稳定运转
光滑表面；光滑面；平滑面
纤维素；细腻组织，均匀组织

trans.tran_en: a smooth surface has no rough parts, lumps, or holes, especially in a way that is pleasant and attractive to touch
If you smooth something, you move your hands over its surface to make it smooth and flat
to make a rough surface flat and even

trans.tran_cn: 弄平， 使平整； 使平稳； 消除
trans.tran_en: to make something such as cloth or hair flat by moving your hands across it
